All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
An abstract action that can be performed on a game.
ActionDecoder
Decodes actions from a given identifier.
ActionResult
Constants explaining why an action completed successfully or failed.
Actions
Possible action identifiers.
AddFivePrestigePointsPower
Class that represents the add five prestige points power.
AddPrestigePointsWithCoatsOfArmsPower
Class that represents the add prestige points according to coat of arms power.
Authentication
Provides useful methods to obtain the token required for the server and check user tokens.
BuyCardAction
Perform the buy card action.
Card
Class representing a Card object.
CardTier
Possible tiers of development cards.
CascadeAction
Perform the cascade action.
CascadeTier1Action
Perform the cascade action.
CascadeTier2Action
Perform the cascade action.
CascadeType
Enum representing the tiers that a cascade can have for orient development cards.
ChooseCityAction
Perform the choose city action (in case when player qualifies for >1 city in one turn).
ChooseNobleAction
Perform the choose noble action (in case when player qualifies for >1 noble in one turn).
ChooseTokenTypeAction
Perform the choose token type for satchel action.
CitiesGame
Class that represents the current state of an orient + cities game.
CitiesPlayer
A concrete implementation of Player for Cities game.
CityCard
Class representing the city cards.
CostType
Enum to represent the types of costs a card can have.
Deck<T extends Card>
Represents a deck of cards, with contains visible (face-up) and non-visible (face-down) cards.
DevelopmentCard
Abstract class that represents a development card.
EmptyRestTemplateErrorHandler
Override the default error handling in rest template to not throw exceptions if not status code == 200.
ExtraTokenAfterPurchasePower
Class that represents the extra token after purchase power.
ExtraTokenAfterTakingSameColorTokensPower
Class that represents the extra token after taking token of same color power.
Game
Class that represents the current state of a game.
GameSaveData
Class holding the necessary variables to register a save game to the LS.
GameSaveInfo
Defines extra information for a game save, also includes the backing game save.
GameSaveInitializer
Handles notifying Lobby Service of game saves.
GameSaveRestController
Rest controller for all API endpoints for game saves.
GameSavesManager
Manages all of Splendor's game saves.
GameServiceInfo
Hold information about the game service.
GameSession
Represent a game session for a Splendor game.
GameVersions
Constants for the different playable expansion combinations.
GoldTokenWorthTwoTokensPower
Class that represents the gold token worth two tokens power.
HideFromClient
Annotation for marking a field to be hidden from the client.
Initializer
Initializer for the server.
LaunchSessionInfo
Construct a launch session info.
NobleCard
Class representing the noble cards.
OrientDevelopmentCard
Class representing the orient development cards.
OrientGame
Class that represents the current state of a base game + orient game.
OrientPlayer
A concrete implementation of Player for Orient game.
Player
Class that represents a player.
PlayerInfo
Construct player info.
Power
Class that represents a power.
RegDevelopmentCard
Class representing a regular development card (non-orient).
ReserveCardAction
Perform the reserve card action.
ReserveNobleAction
Perform the reserve noble action.
SessionManager
Hold all the game sessions available.
SplendorException
Simple exception class that allows us to differentiate between other exceptions from a known Splendor exception.
SplendorGameApplication
Defines Spring Boot Application for Splendor Game.
SplendorRestController
Rest controller for all API endpoints of Splendor game.
SplendorTypeAdapter
Creates a Gson with proper type adapters to handle serialization and deserialization.
TakeExtraTokenAfterPurchasePowerAction
Perform power 1 after purchasing a development card.
TakeTokenAction
Perform the take token action.
TokenType
Enum representing the types of tokens.
TradingPostsGame
Class that represents the current state of an orient + trading posts game.
TradingPostsPlayer
A concrete implementation of Player for Trading Posts game.
WebConfiguration
Set up configuration for the server-client interactions.
